column5: Close to Space Center Houston and NASA Johnson Space Center 5 miles, Kemah Boardwalk 4 miles, and on the waterfront. Enjoy the views, lakefront property, amenities, water activities on site such as a swimming pool, hot tub, kayak, and dock. For couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. This is a 362 sq ft efficiency apartment attached to a house with a separate entrance and driveway parking with kitchen & laundry. The apartment is located on the second floor. Not for parties.
